message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this amazing product. I'm willing to offer it to you for $11,000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but $11,000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with.  I'm willing to pay $9,000 for it.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your concerns, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $10,200.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down in price, but $10,200 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm sticking with my offer of $9,000. It's a fair price, and I'm confident we can both be happy with this deal.

Bob, I understand your persistence, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9,000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $10,000. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $10,000 is still too high. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $9,500. This is my final offer. If we can't agree on this price, I'll have to explore other options.

Bob, I understand your persistence, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9,500. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $9,800. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
